reviews.review:
I had a terrible experience at this location. I've asked for a "Stewed tofu and mushroom with rice" but was told it was out of stock.
Then I asked for "French fries", which the cashier turned to her colleagues and started laughing. I asked if it was out of stock also, she said no. It was such an unpleasant interaction. Why would it be on the menu?

Lastly, I ordered a "Legend coffee" and a "Fried rice with shredded chicken". There was a bug in my soup, which I've returned to the kitchen.
The rice was also tasteless.

Disappointed experience, would not come back.

reviews.name: tk tk
reviews.review:
I visited Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee World (Th·∫ø Gi·ªõi C√† Ph√™ Trung Nguy√™n Legend). There is a sophisticated space that is irresistible for coffee lovers. The interior of the restaurant had a calm atmosphere, and the interior was a fusion of tradition and modernity. The staff was courteous and explained the characteristics of the coffee in detail when ordering.

In particular, Trung Nguyen Legend's signature blend is aromatic and has a deep flavor. The Vietnamese egg coffee and classic Vietnamese filter coffee were also delicious. There is a wide variety of beans available, and souvenir packages are also available.

This cafe is perfect for those who want to forget the hustle and bustle of the city and spend some relaxing time. This is a must-visit place for coffee lovers as you can experience the depth of Vietnamese coffee.

reviews.review:
Trung Yen Legend Coffee seems to be a well-known store in Vietnam. After the trip, I searched and found that it is a good variety of coffee beans produced by Trung Nguyen, a representative brand. The places I visited were the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office in District 1 of Ho Chi Minh City, and the Trung Yen Legend Coffee World branch, which I happened to visit while walking down the street.
The first impression of the store was a coffee shop where you can see drip coffee sets and various coffee accessories in a sophisticated and luxurious atmosphere suitable for the city center. I was able to taste Vietnamese coffee from Cafe Den (Vietnamese Americano), Cafe Ser (Vietnamese Cafe Latte), and Park Si-woo (Cafe Ser + Condensed Milk).

Today I went to Trung Nguyen Legend Xo Vi Nghe Tinh store
+) I have several vouchers for 1 cup of iced milk coffee for 45k for free, but the shop only allows me to order 34k by default and doesn't allow me to order other drinks.
Meanwhile, Hingland also has a free voucher for a 35k cup of coffee, but you can order all the dishes there to compensate.
+) My friend asked me to buy a 50% discount voucher. The store requires confirmation of the owner's account before allowing use.
While hingland, broken rice Phuc Loc Tho just oder scan the code and show the code has paid and you're done
Summary: 1 day spent trying to exchange but not being able to due to strange requests from the shop and losing several accumulated vouchers.
Vouchers like this are better than not having them.
I think this is a huge difference between Trung Nguyen and Hingland as well as the way the two brands handle it

reviews.name: long giang vo
reviews.review:
The shop is located right at Hang Xanh roundabout, next to HUB university. The shop has 3 floors equipped with air conditioning, simple but luxurious decoration with 2 main colors: white and coffee brown.
On the ground floor, right at the entrance is the order counter, the shop serves coffee and tea at quite competitive prices, cheaper than Hightland and Phuc Long with equivalent or even higher quality. The ground floor and first floor are always crowded, mostly young people, the ground floor is a bit noisier than the first floor.
The layout style of the floors is quite similar with 2 main colors, however the 2nd and 3rd floors are decorated in a more Zen style and are completely quiet, probably well soundproofed so they are completely separate from the world. Outside, the decoration is very elegant and polite, it is the only place where smoking is allowed, and is equipped with a deodorizer so even though the space is closed, it does not smell bad and does not affect the next table. Silence is strictly respected. I really like this at Trung Nguyen Legend Cafe, it is also a unique and unique point that I highly appreciate here.

A while later, my friend came over so I ordered 2 more portions of beef rice and 1 cup of coffee. When I paid, I didn't pay attention to the points, but when I got home, I saw that there were 284 points left. The next time I drink coffee, it's still 280. I wonder if the shops will tell me to contact IT. My next drinking spot is 3/2, DBP, CMT8, LTK. So my score goes up, but it's like if I drink at that place regularly 2 or 3 times, my score goes down again. Most recently, my score went back up to 292 points, but on the 28th or 29th, when I drank coffee at 5:00 p.m. at Ly T. Kiet's restaurant, my score was deducted again to 288 points (this score is a promotion score, not a deduction when pay). Or Trung Nguyen changed its policy of not wanting to promote Platinum status or there were negative problems in Trung Nguyen's franchised coffee shops. Please ask Trung Nguyen to review my case. If you want evidence, please contact me for specific work. I also wondered about this at 3/2 and DBP shops but it still didn't work. For other customers whose membership cards are about to be upgraded, please check them out.

reviews.review:
The shop is located on a main road, easy to find. Luxurious space suitable for working and receiving guests. The cafe sits on the ground floor and 1st floor, above the 2nd floor there is a meditation room area.
Food and drink prices are quite high. Silver is 65k, salted coffee is 89k. Drinks come with candy, quotes, detailed information about the drink, and a delicious and cool cup of bean tea. The staff constantly refills the tea.
Coffee in Trung Nguyen, in my personal opinion, is delicious, but the price is quite high so I don't often sit there.

reviews.name: Bui Anh
reviews.review:
Coffee shop with classy space.
I sit here on the morning of the 2nd day of Tet 2025, drinking a delicious Picasso Latte and chatting with my friend. The restaurant space is very quiet and suitable for intimate meetings, working or exchanging with partners/customers
The restaurant has many beautiful views, many seats, large tables and many electrical outlets. Suitable for sitting and working.
Prices are a bit high compared to the average, more suitable for working people than students.
Friendly staff, take good care of guests.
Overall 5 stars, will come back often

reviews.review:
Trung Nguyen Legend's preparation is the same as anywhere else. Tasty.
However, as for this location, this is the first place I visited to enjoy Trung Nguyen nearly 10 years ago. Because me and my friends are in District 10. I got married to GV, so every night when I go on dates with friends, I choose TN HVT in the middle, so this shop is so familiar. Until one of her friends hunted for something and occasionally got a discount code. Every time I use a discount code, it means the service is poor. Normally for glass cups and crockery cups, there is a discount code for portable plastic S size cups to take away even if customers are already seated at the table. While going to other TN Legend at the Airport or District 10, they are still served in glass or ceramic cups. I'm allergic to coffee made from plastic cups. It loses the delicious taste of coffee. Sometimes there are discount codes, but that kind of service is really "disrespecting customers". I think the restaurant should change this service style. Now my friends don't want to go to this restaurant anymore. Normally there is no discount code, so I happily order a portion of Rumi Cafe for 129k. Don't look down on customers holding discount codes. Discourage this point.
It's lovely to have Mr. NV keep the car.

The price is 55k/1 cup so the service quality should be commensurate with that amount. There's nothing here, once and for all, never to return.

reviews.review: There are a variety of drinks and food on the menu here - you should ask the counter staff to know exactly what's available today. Reasonable prices and quality drinks. The restroom is okay, not completely clean but not dirty, having hand sanitizer is a big plus. However, sitting here, especially on the 1st floor, is very hot, it gets hotter at noon because there are no trees right in front of the shop, and the shop also doesn't have sunshades - I really don't understand why the shop doesn't have curtains in this location, making me sweat.

reviews.name: Thanh Loan Ho
reviews.review:
Actually, I come to Trung Nguyen a lot because I feel satisfied with the space and the service of the staff. However, after yesterday, I decided not to visit Trung Nguyen anymore for several reasons:
- The security guard was not enthusiastic about arranging a car for the customer. When he left to pick up the car, he only came to pick up the ticket while his eyes were still focused on the phone screen playing games.
- Trung Nguyen HVT has just had a change in service staff and the feeling is that Trung Nguyen no longer really cares about staff training. When guests came in, there was no greeting even though my companion and I politely said "hello". When going to the 2nd floor, it was no exception, the staff did not greet guests at all.
- When ordering, they didn't say anything, didn't confirm what the customer ordered, and didn't even say yes
- Actually, the image of the employee making a drink while mouthing something is very offensive. The male waiter on the 2nd floor yesterday left me with a very bad impression about that.
- Normally when I leave, I always receive thanks from the staff. I was even very impressed with the cashier girl on the first floor a while ago because of her friendliness. But nowadays, employees hardly know how to say thank you
Maybe I'm picky myself, but if I work on service, I think it's better to have perfection to create a good impression on customers.

reviews.review:
1. Convenient location near hospitals, parks and airports. The shop's design is not very eye-catching.
2. Although the restaurant didn't have many customers, it wasn't very cool. I asked the staff to turn down the heat to make it cooler, but the staff said the air conditioner couldn't be adjusted. This is funny.
3. My coffee taste level is not high, so drinking a 50k cup of coffee doesn't feel any different from other shops. The price is high compared to other brand shops such as: Cop Phe Hao, Twice... only 30k. The green tea and jelly are only average, and the prices are still higher than other shops. In short, the price is high, the taste is nothing better.
4. The service staff is normal, not as welcoming and cheerful as other branded shops. There is a separate ground floor for gentlemen to smoke, another point of difference. There were books to win people's hearts and encourage learning on each guest's table, but I noticed that no one had them in their hands.

reviews.name: Le Nguyen Hai
reviews.review:
After a while, Trung Nguyen Hoang Van Thu was so bad.
1. The sofa on the 3rd floor has stains and stains, it feels like they haven't cleaned it all year.
2. At 8:30 a.m., the air conditioner on the 3rd floor doesn't turn on. According to the staff, there will be service staff on the 3rd floor at 9:00 am. I discussed that I don't need service, I just need to turn on the air conditioner for me and the staff agreed but they still didn't open it, it felt like They are very indifferent to customers. If they don't agree, just talk frankly with the customer, you can't say one thing and do another like that.
3. Wifi on the 3rd floor is extremely slow and almost impossible to access.

In my opinion, if you pay a higher price to go to Trung Nguyen, the amenities they bring must be better. It's a pity that I was in such a hurry that I didn't remember to take photos so everyone could have a more intuitive view before deciding whether to enter the 3rd floor of Trung Nguyen Hoang Van Thu or not!

reviews.review:
Review of Trung Nguyen Coffee - Remax: Disappointment after upgrading

I have been a regular customer of Trung Nguyen Coffee - Remax for more than half a year, especially love the egg meat sandwich with coffee at a reasonable combo price of 55,000 VND. However, after the restaurant was upgraded, my experience completely changed in a negative direction.
Disappointing points:
* Price hike: The price of a single egg shumai sandwich has increased to 66,000 VND, a price too high compared to the quality received.
* Food quality has decreased: The taste of egg shumai bread is no longer as good as before, far behind the Remax Coffee shop next door with a more affordable price (45,000 VND).
* Noisy space: Using a lot of glass in the design makes the shop very noisy, especially when there are many customers. The chatter of groups of customers creates a bustling feeling like a market, losing the inherent quietness of a coffee shop.

* Inadequate upgrades: Although the restaurant space is more beautiful and luxurious after the upgrade, these changes cannot compensate for the decrease in food quality and increase in prices.

Conclude:
With the current price and quality of food like that, I will never return to Trung Nguyen Coffee - Remax again. I feel disappointed by this negative change.

reviews.name: B√¨nh L√¢m
reviews.review:
On the evening of February 9, 2025, I and my younger brother just went drinking here. And I still get served as always, the atmosphere and decoration of the restaurant have been upgraded very beautifully!!!
But when the iced tea was brought out, everything beautiful in my eyes was Shattered!!!! The iced tea has a very disgusting taste!!! It smells of tobacco, very strong, I don't believe that a reputable cafe like Trung Nguyen would use such disgusting iced tea to invite customers to drink... It didn't stop there, I drank a cotton ball the size of a cigarette filter. I still didn't believe this was a cigarette filter, so I showed it to the barista. They didn't explain and didn't apologize for the cotton ball, and just said that the tea smelled similar to cigarettes, because I couldn't remember what kind of tea we were using. And I asked for a new glass of iced tea, but it still smelled like cigarettes, very disgusting!!!
After returning home, I recalled the incident. I deduced that a cigarette had been dropped in that batch of tea, cooked, and given to customers to drink without the shop's carelessness.
Right now I'm still having chills and vomiting from the horrible taste of that iced tea!!!
This is my own opinion, it may be right or wrong, but the cotton ball in the tea cup is very unusual.
Sincerely give your feedback so that the shop can fix it if it was accidentally dropped in, or if it's really due to the smell of that tea, please change to another type, because I'm sure no one can drink tea that smells 100% like tobacco!!!

Trung Nguyen Legend is not only a leading name in the Vietnamese coffee industry but also a symbol of a global corporation with **a great organizational vision**, **by serving the human community* *. Setting foot in Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee at 441 Le Van Viet, District 9, Ho Chi Minh, customers will not only enjoy fragrant cups of coffee but also feel the mission and core values of the brand. This gives.

Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee creates a culturally rich coffee enjoyment space, where all senses are awakened. From decoration to lighting to music, every element is taken care of so customers can immerse themselves in a mindful, inspired lifestyle. Coffee here is not just a drink but also a means to connect people and build community.

"Great organization by serving the human community" is not an empty slogan. **Core Values**

With **Absolute faith** in the values we pursue, Trung Nguyen Legend demonstrates **service to the community** and **humanity's response** through every cup of coffee and every business activity. joint. **Strong finances** not only refers to financial strength but also stability and sustainable development year after year.

**Conclude**

Coming to Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee at 441 Le Van Viet, you will not only enjoy the great taste of coffee but also share and be inspired by the vision, mission and core values that Trung Nguyen Legend aims for. . Each cup of coffee here is not just a drink, but also an inspiration for a mindful lifestyle, towards love, service and contributing to the common prosperity of the community.

reviews.review:
Service quality:
Trung Nguyen's coffee shop stands out with its cozy, spacious space, suitable for both working and meeting friends. Friendly, attentive staff, quick and professional service. The menu is extensive, including many types of Vietnamese specialty coffee, from filter coffee to roasted ground coffee, and creative drinks.

Experience and reviews:
Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee brings an experience of Vietnamese coffee culture with rich, delicious coffee quality. Each cup of coffee is carefully processed, preserving its unique flavor. In particular, shops often have quiet areas and electrical outlets for customers to work or study. In addition, guests can also visit and buy typical coffee products to take home.

reviews.name: H·∫°nh Tr∆∞∆°ng
reviews.review:
I went to the Milk Coffee order shop. If the shop has many types of milk coffee, the order staff must at least ask me which type I want to use. The shop automatically gives me the Creative 5 type (59k/cup). As a seller and a buyer, there is no misunderstanding here. I feel like the shop is intentionally unclear in ordering by not asking which type I use when there are several types of milk coffee but proactively gives me the most expensive one. With the shop's space and service at a normal level, spending 59k for a cup of milk coffee like that (I went with 2 people, ordered 2 cups) is really not worth the money.
Quan should improve the above problem whether intentionally or unintentionally.

reviews.name: Tai Vo
reviews.review: The restaurant has just been renewed after my previous visit. The new decor looks more elegant and brighter. The tea is fragrant, the drinks are normal. Everything seemed fine until I took the car out. Because I arrived at rush hour, I couldn't pull up to the curb in front of the restaurant to park my car. So I went around the bow of the ship to park my car at the back of the shop. At that time, I saw a number of motorbikes parked there. But it turned out it was a customer's car from the restaurant next door, and I don't understand why they were allowed to park their car on this side of the restaurant. And when I took my car out, I saw that my car was parked close to that shop's car, blocking the helmet I hung on the car. When I took the hat out, it was completely scratched like the photo below. The car was parked close to me and I had to struggle for a while to get it out. Why do other shops in Trung Nguyen's area leave their cars indiscriminately like that, leading to damage to customers' belongings and cars? If Trung Nguyen guests are not allowed to park there, there must be a warning sign to let guests know!

I really like drinking Trung Nguyen filter coffee, but when I go to Nguyen Thuet to drink it, I don't know what kind of coffee to use or how you guys make it, but it's very bad: neither fragrant nor strong and bitter and not as delicious as other places. Another Trung Nguyen Legend!
- The restaurant space is extremely hot and sometimes the toilet smells bad! The whole shop has an air conditioner, but it's very old and not cool. It's so hot that you have to turn on the fan to drink, which is like torture! I don't think a big brand would leave a restaurant that old and hot like that, but the air conditioner is so old and black that it's not cold enough! This restaurant would rather be closed than leave it as it will lose its image! Not a single piece! After drinking, Beo and Nga said goodbye and won't go back! And they also don't want to go back to any Trung Nguyen shop to drink again! Someone went to the shop's Facebook page to talk about this and only looked at it and didn't respond to customers, which is really bad customer service! The shop staff's face is not happy either!

reviews.name: nhi vi
reviews.review: Ô∏è Drinks: after visiting the shop a few times, I learned from experience that I should order coffee dishes. Trung Nguyen's coffee is very delicious, rich, and extremely fragrant. I drank jelly latte and ended up with this dish. As for types like cocoa and matcha, they're not that great.. Every night we go on a date to drink coffee, it's like we don't get to sleep until 2 or 3 in the morning. Hiuhiu. But it still has the taste of TN coffee and will support it for a long time. . Price: Ranging from 55-65k.  Location: Located on a one-way street, on the left side. It's a bit inconvenient because motorbike riders have to pay attention to crossing car lanes. Parking in the house next to the shop.. Space: large. Every time I come here there are no customers so it's very airy and comfortable. Play soft music, suitable for studying or working.

The space here is not as beautiful and airy as other branches. Compared to TN in Da Nang, the style is far away from the sky, with low ceilings and few tables and chairs, a bit dark. The drinks are still as good as other places, the decoration is a bit sketchy.
The big minus point is that the water has an iron taste, I don't know if it's due to rust or something else, the taste is like some tubes of iron supplements, drinking a small sip makes me super nauseous even though I really like TN's tea -_- Made me doubt my life, drinking salted coffee in fear... An experience that was not as expected.
